mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ChallengeParticipation WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId} AND user_id = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ChallengeParticipation (challenge_id, user_id, status, my_fee, created_at) VALUES (#{challengeId}, #{userId}, 'PARTICIPATING', #{myFee}, NOW())
mapper.select: select u.nickname as nickName, cp.challenge_amount as challengeAmount, cp.status from challengeParticipation as cp inner join user as u on cp.user_id = u.id where cp.challenge_id = #{challengeId}
select u.nickname as nickName, cp.challenge_count as challengeCount, cp.status from challengeParticipation as cp inner join user as u on cp.user_id = u.id where cp.challenge_id = #{challengeId}

select cp.challenge_id, c.title, c.start_date, c.end_date, cp.status, cp.my_fee, cp.prize from challengeParticipation as cp join challenge as c on cp.challenge_id =c.id where cp.user_id = #{userId} and cp.status IN ('SUCCESS', 'FAIL')
